verses.verse: הַצַּדִּ֣יק <WH6662> The righteous אָבָ֔ד <WH6> perisheth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> and no man שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> layeth עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֑ב <WH3820> [it] to heart וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> men חֶ֤סֶד <WH2617> and merciful נֶֽאֱסָפִים֙ <WH622> [are] taken away בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> no מֵבִ֔ין <WH995> none considering כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> the evil נֶאֱסַ֥ף <WH622> is taken away הַצַּדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> that the righteous

יָב֣וֹא <WH935> He shall enter שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> into peace יָנ֖וּחוּ <WH5117> they shall rest עַל־ <WH5921> in מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <WH4904> in their beds הֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> [each one] walking נְכֹחֽוֹ׃ <WH5228> [in] his uprightness

וְאַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you קִרְבוּ־ <WH7126> But draw near הֵ֖נָּה <WH2008> here בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> hither ye sons עֹנְנָ֑ה <WH6049> of the sorceress זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> the seed מְנָאֵ֖ף <WH5003> of the adulterer וַתִּזְנֶֽה׃ <WH2181> and the whore

עַל־ <WH5921> Against מִי֙ <WH4310> whom תִּתְעַנָּ֔גוּ <WH6026> Against whom do ye sport עַל־ <WH5921> Against מִ֛י <WH4310> whom תַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <WH7337> yourselves? against whom make ye a wide פֶ֖ה <WH6310> mouth תַּאֲרִ֣יכוּ <WH748> [and] draw out לָשׁ֑וֹן <WH3956> babbler הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you יִלְדֵי־ <WH3206> boy פֶ֖שַׁע <WH6588> of transgression זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> a seed שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> of falsehood

הַנֵּֽחָמִים֙ <WH2552> Enflaming בָּֽאֵלִ֔ים <WH410> yourselves with idols תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָ֑ן <WH7488> under every green שֹׁחֲטֵ֤י <WH7819> slaying הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> the children בַּנְּחָלִ֔ים <WH5158> in the valleys תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Under סְעִפֵ֥י <WH5585> under the clifts הַסְּלָעִֽים׃ <WH5553> rock

בְּחַלְּקֵי־ <WH2511> Among the smooth נַ֣חַל <WH5158> [stones] of the stream חֶלְקֵ֔ךְ <WH2506> [is] thy portion הֵ֥ם <WH1992> like הֵ֖ם <WH1992> they גּוֹרָלֵ֑ךְ <WH1486> they they [are] thy lot גַּם־ <WH1571> Even לָהֶ֞ם <WH1992> you שָׁפַ֥כְתְּ <WH8210> even to them hast thou poured נֶ֙סֶךְ֙ <WH5262> a drink offering הֶעֱלִ֣ית <WH5927> thou hast offered מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> a meat offering הַ֥עַל <WH5921> concerning אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אֶנָּחֵֽם׃ <WH5162> Should I receive comfort

עַ֤ל <WH5921> and הַר־ <WH2022> mountain גָּבֹ֙הַּ֙ <WH1364> Upon a lofty וְנִשָּׂ֔א <WH5375> and high שַׂ֖מְתְּ <WH7760> hast thou set מִשְׁכָּבֵ֑ךְ <WH4904> thy bed גַּם־ <WH1571> also שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there עָלִ֖ית <WH5927> even thither wentest thou up לִזְבֹּ֥חַ <WH2076> to offer זָֽבַח׃ <WH2077> sacrifice

וְאַחַ֤ר <WH310> Behind הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <WH1817> the doors וְהַמְּזוּזָ֔ה <WH4201> also and the posts שַׂ֖מְתְּ <WH7760> hast thou set up זִכְרוֹנֵ֑ךְ <WH2146> thy remembrance כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed מֵאִתִּ֞י <WH853> גִּלִּ֣ית <WH1540> for thou hast discovered וַֽתַּעֲלִ֗י <WH5927> [thyself to another] than me and art gone up הִרְחַ֤בְתְּ <WH7337> thou hast enlarged מִשְׁכָּבֵךְ֙ <WH4904> thy bed וַתִּכְרָת־ <WH3772> and made לָ֣ךְ מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> You אָהַ֥בְתְּ <WH157> thee [a covenant] with them thou lovedst מִשְׁכָּבָ֖ם <WH4904> their bed יָ֥ד <WH3027> where חָזִֽית׃ <WH2372> thou sawest

וַתָּשֻׁ֤רִי <WH7788> And thou wentest לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> to the king בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with ointment וַתַּרְבִּ֖י <WH7235> and didst increase רִקֻּחָ֑יִךְ <WH7547> thy perfumes וַתְּשַׁלְּחִ֤י <WH7971> and didst send צִרַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH6735> thy messengers עַד־ <WH5704> A great מֵ֣רָחֹ֔ק <WH7350> far off וַתַּשְׁפִּ֖ילִי <WH8213> and didst debase עַד־ <WH5704> against שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <WH7585> [thyself even] unto hell

בְּרֹ֤ב <WH7230> in the greatness דַּרְכֵּךְ֙ <WH1870> of thy way יָגַ֔עַתְּ <WH3021> Thou art wearied לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not אָמַ֖רְתְּ <WH559> [yet] saidst נוֹאָ֑שׁ <WH2976> thou not There is no hope חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> the life יָדֵךְ֙ <WH3027> of thine hand מָצָ֔את <WH4672> thou hast found עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not חָלִֽית׃ <WH2470> therefore thou wast not grieved

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִ֞י <WH4310> of whom דָּאַ֤גְתְּ <WH1672> And of whom hast thou been afraid וַתִּֽירְאִי֙ <WH3372> or feared כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תְכַזֵּ֔בִי <WH3576> that thou hast lied וְאוֹתִי֙ <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor זָכַ֔רְתְּ <WH2142> and hast not remembered לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor שַׂ֖מְתְּ <WH7760> me nor laid עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבֵּ֑ךְ <WH3820> care for הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> Nor אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I מַחְשֶׁה֙ <WH2814> hold peace וּמֵ֣עֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> even of old וְאוֹתִ֖י <WH853> לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor תִירָֽאִי׃ <WH3372> and thou fearest

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> I will declare צִדְקָתֵ֑ךְ <WH6666> thy righteousness וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעֲשַׂ֖יִךְ <WH4639> and thy works וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יוֹעִילֽוּךְ׃ <WH3276> for they shall not profit

בְּזַֽעֲקֵךְ֙ <WH2199> When thou criest יַצִּילֻ֣ךְ <WH5337> deliver קִבּוּצַ֔יִךְ <WH6899> let thy companies וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֻּלָּ֥ם <WH3605> all יִשָּׂא־ <WH5375> shall carry them all away ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> thee but the wind יִקַּח־ <WH3947> shall take הָ֑בֶל <WH1892> vanity וְהַחוֹסֶ֥ה <WH2620> [them] but he that putteth his trust בִי֙ יִנְחַל־ <WH5157> in me shall possess אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וְיִירַ֖שׁ <WH3423> and shall inherit הַר־ <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> my holy

וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> And shall say סֹֽלּוּ־ <WH5549> Cast ye up סֹ֖לּוּ <WH5549> cast ye up פַּנּוּ־ <WH6437> prepare דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הָרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> take up מִכְשׁ֖וֹל <WH4383> the stumblingblock מִדֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֜ר <WH559> For thus saith רָ֣ם <WH7311> the high וְנִשָּׂ֗א <WH5375> and lofty One שֹׁכֵ֥ן <WH7931> that inhabiteth עַד֙ <WH5703> eternity וְקָד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> [is] Holy שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> whose name מָר֥וֹם <WH4791> in the high וְקָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> and holy אֶשְׁכּ֑וֹן <WH7931> I dwell וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with דַּכָּא֙ <WH1793> [place] with him also [that is] of a contrite וּשְׁפַל־ <WH8217> and humble ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> spirit לְהַחֲיוֹת֙ <WH2421> to revive ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit שְׁפָלִ֔ים <WH8217> of the humble וּֽלְהַחֲי֖וֹת <WH2421> and to revive לֵ֥ב <WH3820> the heart נִדְכָּאִֽים׃ <WH1792> of the contrite ones

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor לְעוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> for ever אָרִ֔יב <WH7378> For I will not contend וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor לָנֶ֖צַח <WH5331> neither will I be always אֶקְּצ֑וֹף <WH7107> wroth כִּי־ <WH3588> For ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> for the spirit מִלְּפָנַ֣י <WH6440> before יַֽעֲט֔וֹף <WH5848> should fail וּנְשָׁמ֖וֹת <WH5397> me and the souls אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> [which] I have made

בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> For the iniquity בִּצְע֛וֹ <WH1215> of his covetousness קָצַ֥פְתִּי <WH7107> was I wroth וְאַכֵּ֖הוּ <WH5221> and smote הַסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> him I hid וְאֶקְצֹ֑ף <WH7107> me and was wroth וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went שׁוֹבָ֖ב <WH7726> frowardly בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> of his heart

דְּרָכָ֥יו <WH1870> his ways רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I have seen וְאֶרְפָּאֵ֑הוּ <WH7495> and will heal וְאַנְחֵ֕הוּ <WH5148> him I will lead וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֧ם <WH7999> him also and restore נִֽחֻמִ֛ים <WH5150> comforts ל֖וֹ וְלַאֲבֵלָֽיו׃ <WH57> unto him and to his mourners

בּוֹרֵ֖א <WH1254> I create [נוּב כ] (נִ֣יב <WH5108> fruit ק) שְׂפָתָ֑יִם <WH8193> of the lips שָׁל֨וֹם ׀ <WH7965> Peace שָׁל֜וֹם <WH7965> peace לָרָח֧וֹק <WH7350> to [him that is] far off וְלַקָּר֛וֹב <WH7138> and to [him that is] near אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וּרְפָאתִֽיו׃ <WH7495> and I will heal

וְהָרְשָׁעִ֖ים <WH7563> But the wicked כַּיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea נִגְרָ֑שׁ <WH1644> [are] like the troubled כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הַשְׁקֵט֙ <WH8252> rest לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יוּכָ֔ל <WH3201> when it cannot וַיִּגְרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1644> cast up מֵימָ֖יו <WH4325> whose waters רֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH7516> mire וָטִֽיט׃ <WH2916> and dirt
אֵ֣ין <WH369> There שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> [There is] no peace אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> my God לָרְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> to the wicked ס
